newcode.description: new code base, based on a starter. You can use `generate` to update based on the `ns.yml` file.

newstarter.description: create new starter from a template.  You can then generate a new code base from it using `newCode`.

force.name: force
force.description: when force is used, the starter is overwritten without warning.

regenerate.description: regenerates code based on a meta file `ns.yml`, custom changes, and a starter. The code directory must have been created for the first time using `newcode`.

test.description:
Confirms that your custom changes have been entered safely, allowing you to generate with an updated or replaced template, or with a changed 'ns.yml' file. For documentation about the rules for custom code placement, please see https://github.com/NoStackApp/ns-flip/wiki/Safe-Custom-Code.

Essentially, the test generates a new version of the code and then simply compares it against your current version.  If there are differences, then there is a problem with your code.
